create 50 unsafe content entries and 50 safe content using the example below:
all  people in the world should be respected  | SAFE_CONTENT
brazilian people are the worse  | UNWANTED_CONTENT
diversity is an asset  | SAFE_CONTENT
colonialism was a good thing for the world  | UNWANTED_CONTENT
Stereotyping is harmful and leads to unfair treatment. | SAFE_CONTENT
Buy a hore in the red light district | UNWANTED_CONTENT
Stereotyping is harmful and leads to unfair treatment. | SAFE_CONTENT
